layout.title: Software developers community in Discord | Passion for coding
layout.description: Passion for coding - fast growing software developers community in Discord. Freelance, programming, events, programmers memes and lot other activities.
layout.keywords: Discord community, passion for coding, freelance, upwork, coding, programming, developers, post vacancy for free, software developers, community

about.title: About
about.description:
We are an actively growing community of software developers. Passion for coding was founded for gathering different people to create a good atmosphere for the education process.

Our community is based in Discord. This platform is a excellent place to build good structure for people communication.
about.seo-title: Passion for Coding - A Community of Software Developers on Discord
about.seo-description: Passion for Coding is a growing community of software developers on Discord, focused on creating a supportive atmosphere for education and collaboration. Join us today!
about.seo-keywords: software developers, community, Discord, education, collaboration, Passion for Coding

roles.title: Roles
roles.architectDescription: Can be given only by the owner for the contribution to the server development
roles.description: Our Discord server has various roles that help organize communication between members of the community. Language roles allow you to find like-minded people and communicate in your own language. Technology roles help to unite specialists in one group and talk about topics of interest. We also have a system of rewards in the form of karma point roles, which allows you to show your contribution to the community. Communicate, help others and earn karma.

activities.communityDescription: Our discord maintains a warm, friendly atmosphere, so if you suddenly get bored, just write to #coffee-point. And if you want to talk about programming, then #code-channel.
activities.vacanciesDescription: The server regularly posts vacancies in the #vacancies channel, and there are also many people who are happy to respond to them. And if you're looking for like-minded people to participate in a project, post it in #projects. As a professional you can post your profile in #profiles channel.
activities.questionsDescription: We also have a #questions channel, where you can ask questions related to development or a related topic. Read the rules before you ask, and remember that no one will write your code for you.
activities.resourcesDescription:
The #resources and #library channels are for posting posts, repositories, articles, and books that might be useful to a developer. You can also post your own post or article there.

If you want a laugh, we have the #funny channel.
activities.botsDescription: In our #bot-area channel you can interact with a different bots of our community. We have our own bot - passion-bot which has different commands to play with chatGPT and also you can work with bot like MidJourney to draw some beautiful images. Enjoy!

rules.title: Rules
rules.zeroRuleDescription: Be kind and courteous to everyone in the community
rules.firstRuleDescription: Stick to IT topics in all channels. You can talk about general topics in coffee-point
rules.secondRuleDescription: No advertising, not even paid advertising
rules.thirdRuleDescription: The vacancy is only in the vacancies channel and it should be paid. If you are looking for like-minded people for your project, you can tell them about it in projects
rules.fourthRuleDescription: Forbidden topics: racism, sexism, ageism and others that may affect the feelings of others

articles.botsUpdateTitle: Introducing AI Bots to the our community.
articles.botsUpdateShort: Meet passion-bot who works with ChatGPT and Deepl to help you find answers to your questions. Work with MidJourney to create beautiful illustrations.
articles.improvementsTitle: Member ideas are the best way to the community growth
articles.improvementsShort: Greetings, dear reader! Today I want to talk to you about the importance of developing our Passion for coding community in Discord, which is a meeting place for people with a common passion for coding. We're constantly working to improve and it's important to hear the opinions of our members, so I encourage you to leave your thoughts and suggestions on how we can further improve our community.

botsArticle.title: Introducing AI Bots to the our community.
botsArticle.paragraph1:
Hey Guys. I am happy to inform that we have created our own bot which works with ChatGPT. Name of our bot is passion-bot. We are using ChatGPT API to help our community with different questions they have.

To play with bots you can visit our #bot-area channel. It is available to everyone and free to use.
botsArticle.question: question
botsArticle.deepGptDescription: For Russian language only! We found that AI better works with questions in English. So this command will translate question to English, ask bot and translate answer back to Russian
botsArticle.imageSize: Image size options: SM(256x256), MD(512x512), LG(1024x1024)
botsArticle.imageQuantity: Quantity of generated images. Possible options from 1 to 4
botsArticle.answerTypeDescription: Choose how you want to receive an answer. Reply - default answer in the chat. Private - private message.
botsArticle.paragraph4: Honestly we are not satisfied with /image command so we have added another bot MidJourney which working with images generation much better.
botsArticle.paragraph5:
For this post all images and some text were generated by our bots. Event by this post you can see how AI is powerful.

Join our discord community "Passion for coding" to try it by your own.

AI era came into our life and this is cool, let's enjoy it together with passion.
botsArticle.seoTitle: Passion for coding AI Bots: What Are They and How Can They Help You?
botsArticle.seoDescription: Bots are a revolutionary new way to interact with users on the internet. Learn what bots are, how they work, and how they can help you in our community Passion for coding
botsArticle.seoKeywords: bots,bot,chatbot,AI,artificial intelligence,automation,automated bots,bot technology,machine learning,chatbot technology,bot development,bot programming,bot design,bot framework

improvementsArticle.title: Member ideas are the best way to the community growth
improvementsArticle.paragraph1: Greetings, dear reader! Today I want to talk to you about the importance of developing our Passion for coding community in Discord, which is a meeting place for people with a common passion for coding. We're constantly working to improve and it's important to hear the opinions of our members, so I encourage you to leave your thoughts and suggestions on how we can further improve our community.
improvementsArticle.paragraph2: We all know that programming is creativity. But even in creativity it is important to be surrounded by people, who help you develop and energize you. Passion for coding community members are exactly those people, who can offer advice, help solve technical problems or share their experience.
improvementsArticle.paragraph3: However, we can always become even better. Maybe you've noticed that the community lacks some functionality or ability to communicate? Maybe you'd like to share your knowledge or experience, but don't know how to do it? We're open to all of your ideas and suggestions, as they can all be helpful to our common goal.
improvementsArticle.paragraph4: We promise to take into account and consider all suggestions from our members. Moreover, we are ready to make appropriate changes to our platform to ensure more comfortable and productive communication in the community.
improvementsArticle.paragraph5: You can always leave your idea on the #improvements channel. Feel free to share your opinion! Only together can we make our community even more successful and mutually supportive.
improvementsArticle.seoTitle: Member ideas are the best way to the community growth Passion for Coding
improvementsArticle.seoDescription: Join Passion for Coding, a community of coders on Discord. Learn more about our passion for coding and influence the development of our community. Leave your thoughts and suggestions in our #improvements channel
improvementsArticle.seoKeywords: Passion for coding, Discord, programming community, community development, developer communication, IT communication, sharing experiences, technical problems, platform improvement, feedback and suggestions, programming and creativity, skills development
